statements: SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_progress WHERE project_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM project_progress WHERE task_status = 'completed';
SELECT project_name, task_name, task_status FROM project_progress WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_name, task_name, task_status, start_date, end_date FROM project_progress WHERE task_status <> 'in progress';
SELECT project_id, project_name, task_name, task_status FROM project_progress WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_progress ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, task_name, task_description, task_status FROM project_progress WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE task_status = 'Completed' AND task_description ILIKE '%important%';
SELECT project_id, task_name, task_status FROM project_progress WHERE project_name LIKE 'Project A%';
SELECT * FROM projectProgress;
SELECT project_name, completion_rate, start_date FROM projectProgress;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projectProgress ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, completion_rate FROM projectProgress WHERE completion_rate > 50;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, completion_rate FROM projectProgress WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projectProgress;
SELECT task_name, task_status, completion_date FROM taskCompletion WHERE task_status = 'Complete';
SELECT project_name, completion_rate FROM projectProgress ORDER BY completion_rate DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projectProgress WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, task_name, completion_date FROM projectProgress JOIN taskCompletion ON projectProgress.project_id = taskCompletion.project_id ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects
SELECT id, name, start_date, end_date, status FROM projects
SELECT project_id, task_name, due_date, completed FROM tasks
SELECT id, task_name, due_date, completed FROM tasks ORDER BY due_date DESC
SELECT task_id, completion_rate, entry_date FROM task_completion_rates WHERE completion_rate > 80
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT task_name, due_date, completed FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT id, completion_rate, entry_date FROM task_completion_rates WHERE completion_rate > 80.00;
SELECT p.name AS project_name, t.task_name, t.completed FROM projects p JOIN tasks t ON p.id = t.project_id WHERE p.status = 'Completed' AND t.completed = TRUE;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, due_date FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE is_completed = TRUE;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM task_assignments ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;

SELECT project_name, task_name, employee_name FROM projects JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id JOIN task_assignments ON tasks.task_id = task_assignments.task_id JOIN employees ON task_assignments.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND due_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, start_date, due_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT t.task_name, p.project_name FROM tasks t JOIN projects p ON t.project_id = p.project_id;
SELECT e.employee_name, t.task_name FROM employees e JOIN task_assignments ta ON e.employee_id = ta.employee_id JOIN tasks t ON ta.task_id = t.task_id;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects;
SELECT task_name, priority FROM tasks WHERE status = 'in progress';
SELECT assignee_name, task_name FROM task_assignee JOIN tasks ON task_assignee.task_id = tasks.task_id;
SELECT comment_text, commenter_name FROM task_comments WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, priority, status FROM tasks WHERE priority = 'high' AND status = 'pending';
SELECT assignee_name, comment_text FROM task_assignee JOIN task_comments ON task_assignee.task_id = task_comments.task_id;

SELECT project_name, task_name, completion_date, completion_status FROM projects JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id JOIN task_progress ON tasks.task_id = task_progress.task_id WHERE completion_status = 'delayed';
